game.name: Angel at Dusk
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 압도적으로 기괴한 아름다움. 쏘고, 피하고, 파괴하라! 종말의 세계가 원초적 욕망으로 깨어나는 슈팅게임!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Overwhelmingly bizarre beauty. Shoot, dodge, and destroy! A shmup where an apocalyptic world awakens to primal desires!

reviewHighlights.text: Not much of a 'shmupper' but this game gives me a reason to tear off my sternum and fire blood bombs from it like a Civil War pea-shooter. I just wish...
Awesome shmup, really cool and different art style, great mechanics etc. The tutorials are humorous and insightful too. Highly recommended!
